Package uk.co.zodiac2000.subscriptionmanager.api

Class SubscriptionController

java.lang.Object
uk.co.zodiac2000.subscriptionmanager.api.SubscriptionController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/subscription", produces="application/json") public class SubscriptionController extends Object
REST API for accessing the subscription aggregate.

  • Method Details

    • handleIllegalState

      @ExceptionHandler(java.lang.IllegalStateException.class) public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView handleIllegalState(IllegalStateException e, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException
      Handles any IllegalStateException thrown by methods in Subscription. If the exception is thrown by any other class then it is re-thrown, otherwise the request exception attribute is set with the exception, a Bad Request (400) is set in the response, and an empty ModelAndView returned. This handler is for situations where a method called on the domain model would leave the model in an invalid state.
      Parameters:
      e - the exception
      request - the HTTP request
      response - the HTTP response
      Returns:
      an empty ModelAndView
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is a problem sending the error in the response

    • getSubscription

      @GetMapping(path="/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SubscriptionResponseDto> getSubscription(@PathVariable("id") long id)
      Returns the Subscription identified by id.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscription id
      Returns:
      the subscription

    • createSubscription

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SubscriptionResponseDto> createSubscription(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid NewSubscriptionCommandDto commandDto)
      Creates a new Subscription aggregate root and persists it. Returns a response document representing the new subscription.
      Parameters:
      commandDto - command DTO representing the new subscription
      Returns:
      a SubscriptionResponseDto

    • deleteSubscription

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(code=NO_CONTENT) public void deleteSubscription(@PathVariable("id") long id)
      Deletes the subscription identified by id.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscription identifier

    • updateSubscriptionDates

      @PutMapping("/{id}/dates") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SubscriptionResponseDto> updateSubscriptionDates(@PathVariable("id") long id, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid SubscriptionDatesCommandDto commandDto)
      Updates the start and end dates associated with the subscription identified by id. Returns the modified subscription or Not Found if the subscription didn't exist.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscription identifier
      commandDto - command DTO representing the new subscription dates
      Returns:
      the modified subscription

    • updateSubscriptionContentIdentifier

      @PutMapping("/{id}/content-identifier") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SubscriptionResponseDto> updateSubscriptionContentIdentifier(@PathVariable("id") long id, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid SubscriptionContentIdentifierCommandDto commandDto)
      Updates the subscription content identifier. Returns the modified subscription or Not Found if the subscription didn't exist.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscription identifier
      commandDto - command DTO representing the new content identifier
      Returns:
      the modified subscription

    • suspendSubscription

      @PutMapping("/{id}/suspend") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SubscriptionResponseDto> suspendSubscription(@PathVariable("id") long id)
      Suspends the subscription identified by id. Returns the modified subscription or Not Found if the subscription doesn't exist. See Subscription#suspend for details.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscription identifier
      Returns:
      the modified subscription

    • terminateSubscription

      @PutMapping("/{id}/terminate") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SubscriptionResponseDto> terminateSubscription(@PathVariable("id") long id)
      Terminates the subscription identified by id. Returns the modified subscription or Not Found if the subscription doesn't exist. See Subscription#terminate for details.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscription identifier
      Returns:
      the modified subscription

    • unsuspendSubscription

      @PutMapping("/{id}/unsuspend") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SubscriptionResponseDto> unsuspendSubscription(@PathVariable("id") long id)
      Unsuspends the subscription identified by id. Returns the modified subscription or Not Found if the subscription doesn't exist. See Subscription#unsuspend for details.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscription identifier
      Returns:
      the modified subscription
